description: This is a simple game where Alexa will state a random comment and you determine whether the random comment is true or false.  At the end you will be given a score how many you got correct.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Random Comments to start new game.
name: Random Comments
shortDescription: This is a simple game where Alexa will state a random comment and you determine whether the random comment is true or false.  At the end you will get a score.
